title: Liam Payne and girlfriend Maya Henry look very much in love on date night
text:
Liam and Maya were seen leaving the Chiltern Firehouse in West London (Backgrid)

Liam Payne enjoyed a date night with new girlfriend Maya Henry last night and the two look very much in love.

The Stack It Up singer, 26, went public with the 19-year-old model earlier this year, after they were spotted holding hands in London.

The couple kept it casual as they were seen leaving the Chiltern Firehouse in West London last night, with Maya seen kissing Liam’s hand as they sped off in a car to their next destination.

Liam and Maya had been linked with each other for a while, being pictured together back in August 2018, but they only confirmed their relationship back in August.

If the couple’s PDA wasn’t enough to prove they’re very much ‘a thing’, Liam also gushed about his new girlfriend on Instagram a few weeks ago, speaking about how she made him ‘happy’.

The couple announced their relationship in August (CRYSTAL PIX / BACKGRID)

Maya is a model who has modelled for Vogue, among others… (CRYSTAL PIX / BACKGRID)

‘Sometimes I don’t recognise this happy guy… sure glad you brought him back though.’

Advertisement

After thanking his team, he added: ‘Last but not least this one @maya_henry for always keeping the biggest smile on my face through all the stress and making me realise how perfect my life really is.

‘Love you all let’s stack this s**t up.’

Liam split with his ex Cheryl in August 2018 and recently admitted that it ‘hurts’ sometimes having to go weeks without seeing his 1-year-old son Bear, who he shares with the singer.

‘Loads of random things happen with kids all the time. Like if he’s not very well, sometimes you miss dates and things. Then a couple of weeks go by, and I haven’t seen him in ages.’

The couple looked very much in love on their date night (A WEIR / BACKGRID)

The couple left the Chiltern Firehouse at 2.30am (Picture: Backgrid)

‘It hurts, it’s horrible, I do want to go out on tour, I’m just going to have to figure out the schedule properly,’ he said.

During an appearance on KISS Breakfast, he spoke about the ‘difference’ between his previous romance with ex Cheryl.

‘Yeah, she’s awesome… it’s kind of got to the point with my life, where I’m like, screw this. It’s not worth my happiness.

‘If someone is going to take a picture, someone is going to do something.

‘The difference is with her, she’s so relaxed that it helps me relax in a situation… It’s been quite nice just going out.’
